Cyberpunk Cityscape.brief: Created a large-scale cyberpunk city environment.
Cyberpunk Cityscape.description: A large-scale cyberpunk city environment with atmospheric effects such as fog, glowing billboards, neon reflections, and Niagara-based portals connecting city zones. Cinematic cityscape renders emphasize mood, lighting, and vertical scale.

Cliff.brief: A cliffside environment using path tracing workflow and foliage painting tools.
Cliff.description: A cliffside environment uses path tracing workflow and foliage painting tools. Implemented dynamic water material and Niagara particle systems to simulate flocks of birds.

Abandoned Land.brief: A cinematic scene of abandoned medieval architecture with volumetric fog and blended materials.
Abandoned Land.description: Created a cinematic scene of abandoned medieval architecture with volumetric fog and blended materials and realistic cloth simulation using Marvelous Designer, integrated into an animated short.

Translucent Material Design.brief: Developed physically-based translucent shaders, showcasing accurate light scattering and transmission effects.
Translucent Material Design.description: Developed physically-based translucent shaders for lanterns, jade, and crystals, showcasing accurate light scattering and transmission effects.

Wasteland.brief: A procedural generation (PCG) project focused on creating a large-scale abandoned town environment.
Wasteland.description: A procedural content generation tool for automatic building placement along defined road layouts. Enabled scalable abandoned town creation, improving workflow efficiency for level design.

Hillside Generation.brief: Hillside Generation explores procedural content generation (PCG) in Unreal Engine.
Hillside Generation.description: Hillside Generation explores procedural content generation (PCG) in Unreal Engine to create natural environments such as rocky cliffs, dense forests, and roadside vegetation.

The Door Between Worlds.brief: Character animation showcasing combat sequences and fluid movement transitions.
The Door Between Worlds.description: Character animation showcasing combat sequences and fluid movement transitions. The animation features a warrior character with a variety of attacks, defensive maneuvers, and idle animations, each with careful attention to weight and momentum.

Simple Bot.brief: A complete character animation system — from hand-keyed animation in Maya to in-engine implementation in Unreal Engine 5.
Simple Bot.description: SimpleBot focuses on creating a complete character animation system — from hand-keyed animation in Maya to in-engine implementation in Unreal Engine 5.

Nexus.brief: A short interactive gameplay demo set in a futuristic warehouse involving a theft scenario.
Nexus.description: A short interactive gameplay demo set in a futuristic warehouse involving a theft scenario. Implemented stealth mechanics requiring the protagonist to avoid guards and navigate the environment.

Gibberwave.brief: A text adventure game with a bit of absurd humor.
Gibberwave.description: A text adventure game with a bit of absurd humor. Your goal is to collect and purify enough nonsense to restore the town to normal before everyone completely turns into alien creatures.

Lost.brief: A first-person horror shooter demo developed in Unreal Engine, focusing on immersive atmosphere and interactive gameplay.
Lost.description: A first-person character system with weapon handling and shooting mechanics. Designed AI enemy behavior with distinct movement and attack patterns.
